description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

FrequencyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

FrequencyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

FrequencyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: A reference to a specific Frequency based on its unique ID (Frequency ID or Workday ID).

Frequency_Data.description: The unique identifier for the frequency
The functional name for the frequency
The number of occurrences within a year for a frequency (e.g. Yearly = 1, Monthly = 12, etc...)

Frequency_BehaviorObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Frequency_BehaviorObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Frequency_BehaviorObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Frequency_Data.description: A mapping to the internal Workday frequencies functionality. The values for this reference can be found using the "Integration IDs" task within the Workday application (Business Object = Frequency Behavior)
A boolean flag indicating whether a worker's weekly hours should be used instead of a normal conversion rate when converting to/from hourly-based rates in Workday Compensation.

validation.validation: Use Weekly Hours only applies to Hourly Frequencies (Frequency Behavior = HOURLY).

Frequency_Data.description: Identifies that the frequency is used in Payroll Interface

description: Container for the core frequency data
